root.name: Gobliins 2: The Prince Buffoon
root.description: Sequel to the first Goblins game. This time you use two Gobliins to solve many puzzles. The levels are bigger, and can take up more screens, so in order to progress, backtracking is common when you miss a certain vital artifact. This makes the game a lot more difficult. Although sometimes very funny, solutions to the puzzles are usually illogical. So keep a walkthrough at hand. The game is fully mouse driven.
